INSERT INTO TBL_QUESTION(Q_BOARD_ID, MEMBER_ID, Q_TITLE, Q_CONTENT) VALUES (#{qBoardId}, #{memberId}, #{qTitle}, #{qContent})
mapper.select: SELECT Q.Q_BOARD_ID, Q.A_STATUS, Q.Q_TITLE, M.MEMBER_ID, M.NICKNAME, TO_CHAR(Q.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE, Q.VIEW_COUNT FROM TBL_QUESTION Q JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON Q.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY Q.Q_BOARD_ID DESC

SELECT M.MEMBER_ID, Q.Q_BOARD_ID, Q.Q_TITLE, M.NICKNAME, TO_CHAR(Q.CREATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREATE_DATE, Q.VIEW_COUNT, Q.Q_CONTENT FROM TBL_QUESTION Q JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON Q.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE Q.Q_BOARD_ID = #{qBoardId}

SELECT Q_BOARD_ID, A_STATUS, Q_TITLE, MEMBER_ID, NICKNAME, CREATE_DATE, VIEW_COUNT FROM ( SELECT Q.Q_BOARD_ID, Q.A_STATUS, Q.Q_TITLE, M.MEMBER_ID, M.NICKNAME, TO_CHAR(Q.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE, Q.VIEW_COUNT FROM TBL_QUESTION Q JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON Q.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ) WHERE Q_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY Q_BOARD_ID DESC
